text:
Created attachment 24549
Encryption Level screen in the secured PDF

Hi

I've been able encrypt my genereted secured PDF in FOP 0.95 using setOptions
method of the Renderer class. 

However, I been told that it uses 40-bit RC4 encryption level and what I would
like to know if there is a way to increase the 40-bit to 128-bit without
actually upgrading my fop to 0.9x?

Or Can be change the Encryption Alogirithm from CR4 to 128bit AES Algorithm?

Kindly help me soon.

Regards,
Ashutosh
creator: ashutoshgupta17@gmail.com
jeremias@apache.org
text: Support for encryption larger than 40bits has not been implemented, yet. Patches are welcome.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P1 open bugs to P3 pending further review
